放入去邊好玩
摔出面正過指插

I suggest that you break up with him. My friend Jason is an aquarius while his girlfriend is a Sagittarius. He'll be giving a birthday party the day after tomorrow but alas I can't attend as I got work to do. When he invited me at first I said "we'll have to see" He's making the most elaborate preparations for the party. My brother asked him "how are the preparstions for the party?" His friend Amy is assisting with the party preparations. John is assisting in making preparations for the party too. Jason and his friends are sharing the preparation between themselves so it isn't too much work. Happy birthday Jason. I'm sure your friends will join me in wishing you a very happy birthday. Last year he got a king size bed frame and mattress for my birthday because he knew I needed them at that time. I remember I said "I can't believe you got me a king size mattress and bed frame" They didn't come cheap. Charles has got a commission to write an article on picasso for an art magazine. He's doing research in preparation for the article. His girlfriend is assisting in the preparation of the research as well. His favourite NBA team Toronto Raptors will be playing against Chicago Bulls in a playoff game. Playoff games require proper preparation. The poster and the promo video are in preparation. The players in Raptors are doing careful preparation for the match as they didn't perform well in the last three games because they did little preparation. The players in Bulls didn't seem to have done much preparation too. They almost lost their last game so this time they're doing thorough preparation for it including stealing, free throw shooting, three point shooting and dunking as well as cardiovascular training. Training six hours a day is ideal preparation for the playoff matches. You cannot play against a high level team without adequate preparation. My friend Judy is making preparations for her ski trip to Hokkaido. She's also making preparations to meet her favourite band X Japan in Nagasaki. So she's preoccupied with these preparations. Preparations are being made for next month's ski festival in Hokkaido. The organizations and institutions who organise it have announced that preparations for it are well under way.
佢唔喂你 你係佢面前捽俾佢睇 示威啊
